description.value:
Wizards that specialize in becoming a Mystic Armiger learn the following spells as Wizard spells once able to cast Wizard spells of the same spell level.  

 

Mystic Armiger Spells

Able to Cast

Spells

Wizard Cantrips

Pick 2: @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.P8AYYAYOXXDCGM9B]{Brace for Impact}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.MB7NWQ5H11LSIVV7]{Caustic Needle}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.0JWJ9J7A2AMSNDK0]{Jolt}

1st Level Wizard Spells

Pick 1: @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.7N5KBCOM40ZX65EO]{Arcane Arrows}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.5F78LN7YILWPNJL2]{Ethereal Mail}

2nd Level Wizard Spells

Pick 2: @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.3BUFFKXCN0WVRIMP]{Barrier}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.LO6PLV28RA6CBCLU]{Burst Into Flames}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.MFJSEGIJAH0UIH47]{Identify}

3rd Level Wizard Spells

Pick 1: @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.FZ8CHP8N6M0PGLI1]{Discombobulate}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-3.6GFN59MWTZPMBQ61]{Haste}

4th Level Wizard Spells

Pick 1: @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.WJRECI4EKOPLMTCE]{Battle Cloaking}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.7H0M1UB9Z1ZVHSJ0]{Remove Arms}
